thread.title: BRIEF-Heliospectra's smart LED grow technology receives European patent
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Heliospectra's smart LED grow technology receives European patent | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Heliospectra's smart LED grow technology receives European patent
text:
Sept 10 Heliospectra publ AB :
* Says has had its European patent application approved by the European Patent Office
* Patent concerns methods in optimizing LED (light emitting diode) lighting for plants as well as to make working processes more efficient in greenhouse environments of the future Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
